Class MultiChainCoreServices

Extension methods for adding both MCWrapper.CLI and MCWrapper.RPC client collections to an application's IServiceCollection dependency injection pipeline service container.

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

AddMultiChainCoreServices(IServiceCollection)

Extension method for adding both MCWrapper.CLI and MCWrapper.RPC client collections to an application's IServiceCollection dependency injection pipeline service container.

RpcOptions, CliOptions, and RuntimeParamOptions are parsed from the local machine's environment variable store or Secret Manager.

Declaration
public static IServiceCollection AddMultiChainCoreServices(this IServiceCollection services)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services

Service collection comprised of various services
Returns
Type Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection

AddMultiChainCoreServices(IServiceCollection, IConfiguration)

Extension method for adding both MCWrapper.CLI and MCWrapper.RPC client collections to an application's IServiceCollection dependency injection pipeline service container.

RpcOptions, CliOptions, and RuntimeParamOptions are parsed from the local IConfiguration pipeline passed via configuration parameter.

Declaration
public static IServiceCollection AddMultiChainCoreServices(this IServiceCollection services, IConfiguration configuration)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services

Service collection comprised of various services
Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration

Configuration pipeline is used to access configuration files and Secret Manager

| Improve this Doc View Source

AddMultiChainCoreServices(IServiceCollection, Action<RpcOptions>, Action<CliOptions>, Action<RuntimeParamOptions>)

Extension method for adding both MCWrapper.CLI and MCWrapper.RPC client collections to an application's IServiceCollection dependency injection pipeline service container.

RpcOptions, CliOptions, and RuntimeParamOptions are parsed from explicitily configured and passed via rpcOptions, cliOptions, and runtimeParamOptions Action parameters.

Declaration
public static IServiceCollection AddMultiChainCoreServices(this IServiceCollection services, Action<RpcOptions> rpcOptions, Action<CliOptions> cliOptions, Action<RuntimeParamOptions> runtimeParamOptions)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services

Service collection comprised of various services
System.Action<MCWrapper.RPC.Options.RpcOptions> rpcOptions

JSON-RPC option values are used to configure blockchain clients
System.Action<MCWrapper.CLI.Options.CliOptions> cliOptions

Command Line Interface options values are used to configure blockchain clients
System.Action<MCWrapper.Ledger.Entities.Options.RuntimeParamOptions> runtimeParamOptions

Runtime parameters are used to configure the blockchain during runtime
Returns
Type Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection
